attributes.action: Put the 'Great' back into Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the past decade Britain has slipped into decline and appears to have lost all fundamentals become so distant from what was once the Great place to live and to be a part of.
No political party has ever managed to please everyone but of late this government seems to be on a path of self destruction with immigration issues, terrorism, stealth taxes, national debt, crime, guns on the street, unemployment, drugs and general anti social behaviour becoming rife

The general concensus of common people is that the 'Great' has become lost and this once idylic isle is no longer the country it once was, it appears to be developing into the dustbin of the world and the general populace is slowly having it's spirit wittled away.

It's time to put the 'Great' back into Great Britain and give one and all the feeling of security and well being that they once had

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
